lambda_1.reasoning: Controls sparsity of the graph structure. Higher values lead to sparser graphs.

lambda_2.reasoning: Controls strength of DAG constraint. Higher values enforce stricter acyclicity.

learning_rate.reasoning: Controls optimization step size. Lower values for stability, higher for faster convergence.

num_iter.reasoning: More iterations may improve results but increase computation time.

equal_variances.meaning: Whether to assume equal noise variances
equal_variances.reasoning: True for simpler model, False for more flexible noise modeling.
